page.title: 12APPLETON ROEBUCK SCHOOL 2
page.content: { Children}start as "Rising Fives" in Reception class & go on to Transition & Junior 1&2.There is a{headteacher}Mr Still,three assistants,Mrs Chittock, Mrs Scholefield, & Mrs Frost,& a part- time assistant,Mrs Green,a secretary, Mrs Tate,2 cooks Mrs Dale & Mrs Hall,a cleaner,Mrs Currie,a rota of lunch supervisors,Mrs Skinner & Mrs Beaton. The day begins 0900 & end at 1530. There is assembly each day for hymns prayers & a story. Pupils{learn:}to read & write,maths, science,art & craft skills,music,P.E., RE,and do projects which include history,geography & World Studies.Some learn to play the violin,recorder,or guitar.There are netball & football team,& a girls' 5 aside football team. Some pupils bring a packed{lunch,}50- 60 buy a school meal which is cooked here.There is a choice of dishes.
